casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Lewis WRAY, Jr. 382P10-7 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017

*686Mr. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Mike Miller, District Attorney, or State of North Carolina.

Mr. John L. Wray, Jr., for Wray, John Lewis, Jr.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of September 2017 by Defendant to Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
